mapper.select: select nw.news_no, nw.title, nw.mno, m.mid, nw.cnts, nw.view_cnt, nw.news_date, nw.class_no from news nw, member m where nw.news_no = #{news_no} and nw.mno = m.mno
mapper.insert: insert into news ( title, mno, mid, class_no, cnts, view_cnt, news_date ) values ( #{title}, #{mno}, #{mid}, #{class_no}, #{cnts}, 0, now() )
mapper.select:
select nw.news_no, nw.class_no, nw.title, nw.mno, m.mid, nw.view_cnt, nw.news_date from news nw, member m where nw.mno = m.mno
and nw.title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and m.mid like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
order by news_no desc limit #{limitNum}, 10

select count(nw.news_no) cnt from news nw, member m where nw.mno = m.mno
and nw.title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and m.mid like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
